title:
Boundary determination of the Riemannian metric from Cauchy data for the
  Stokes equations
abstract:
For a compact connected Riemannian manifold of dimension $n$ with smooth
boundary, $n\geqslant 2$, we prove that the Cauchy data (or the
Dirichlet-to-Neumann map) for the Stokes equations uniquely determines the
partial derivatives of all orders of the metric on the boundary of the
manifold.
